md:
giải nghĩa từ "thwarted" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ đồng nghĩa.

* Thwarted (verb) /θwɔːrtɪd/:
	+ Meaning: to prevent someone from doing something or to stop something from happening.
	+ Type: verb
	+ Example sentence: "The government's new policy thwarted the company's plans to expand."
	+ Related words: hinder, obstruct, block, foil
	+ Synonyms: prevent, stop, frustrate, defeat

* Thwarted (adjective) /θwɔːrtɪd/:
	+ Meaning: feeling frustrated or disappointed because something has been prevented from happening.
	+ Type: adjective
	+ Example sentence: "She felt thwarted in her attempts to get a promotion."
	+ Related words: frustrated, disappointed, blocked, hindered
	+ Synonyms: foiled, defeated, unsuccessful, unhappy
html:
giải nghĩa từ "thwarted" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ đồng nghĩa.

  • Thwarted (verb) /θwɔːrtɪd/:

    • Meaning: to prevent someone from doing something or to stop something from happening.
    • Type: verb
    • Example sentence: "The government's new policy thwarted the company's plans to expand."
    • Related words: hinder, obstruct, block, foil
    • Synonyms: prevent, stop, frustrate, defeat

  • Thwarted (adjective) /θwɔːrtɪd/:

    • Meaning: feeling frustrated or disappointed because something has been prevented from happening.
    • Type: adjective
    • Example sentence: "She felt thwarted in her attempts to get a promotion."
    • Related words: frustrated, disappointed, blocked, hindered
    • Synonyms: foiled, defeated, unsuccessful, unhappy
